STEP BY STEP GUIDE TO SET UP YOUR PROJECT

Fill in the details

Our tests are driven by the details you provide. We are working on adding more test features to make it an all in one test suite for your requirements.

Make sure to specify website type

Every website is unique in it's own way. Tell us the type and let us do the testing based on best practices.

Add testcases

Fill in the details to add testcases. Input headers and payload only if necessary else it is optional.

Run tests!

CYou can run individual tests by clicking on 'Run'under the decision column or run all tests at once by clicking the 'Run All' button.

Keep adding, Keep testing!

View all projects under the projects overview tab and add or run more tests by clicking the 3 dots.
